title: BoXXoB
author: BoXXoB
created_time: June 20, 2023, 08:40:07 PMLast edit: December 06, 2023, 04:08:05 PM by BoXXoB
content: Welcome to the l0tt0.com Signature CampaignBitcoin Games Like You've Never Seen!ANN: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5457016.0I, BoXXoB, will be managing this campaign on behalf of l0tt0.com.l0tt0.com is responsible for funding the campaign but I will be handling the payments with funds supplied by them.Not taking applications. Campaign is currently in invite-only mode.Taking applications currently.The campaign is intended to be a long-running one that rewards loyal participants who take pride in putting out the best quality.Participant Requirements:We seek active forum members who make constructive posts. There is currently no minimum post amount that needs to be made weekly. This is because we look for people who want to post on the forum. Not people who just post because they are paid to do so to meet some minimum criteria.Be able to wear Avatar & Signature*Active Bitcointalk userBe atleast Sr. MemberActive in Gambling & Gambling Discussion boardsAgrees not to change their signature during their participation in the campaignAbility to make posts in a constructive and coherent mannerNo negative trust in profile*** Exceptions may be made in special circumstances**Receiving negative trust during campaign may result in disqualificationRules:Must wear avatar and signature for the entire duration of participationPosts must be on-topic, constructive and coherentPosts must be made by yourself i.e. No AI or other tools to generate themOne account in the campaign per person allowedRules may be subject to change at the discretion of the campaign manager, however, changed rules only apply to upcoming rounds, not current roundFailure to comply with the rules can result in disqualification at the discretion of the campaign managerPay rates:BONUSBonus will be implemented once we have more participants.$50 bonus weekly to selected usersBased on:Most clicks/sign-ups from the signature (unique link for each participant)*Post quality, merit earned, contribution to the forum as a whole, participation in constructive discussion  etc. (at the discretion of the campaign manager)***Each week atleast one user is selected**No pre-determined number of selected users weeklyFlat rates (the minimum to be earned):Sr. Members$50 WeeklyHero Members$75 WeeklyLegendary Members$100 WeeklyHow to apply?1. Campaign manager will invite potential participants.2.Applying (open temporarily)Code:Bitcoin address:Merit earned in last 120 days:When can you start?:SignaturesMemberCode:[center]⚫︎  ⚫︎  ⚫︎ comments.body: Signatures will be ready soon and will be updated to the post when they are ready. Campaign is set to start with 5 participants this week (tomorrow at the earliest but will be confirmed based on applications). Sr. Members+ who meet the participant requirements may apply.

comments.body: Someone asked me when the campaign starts so I will reply all here too.The campaign starts when we have gone through applications and have got 5 participants. I will start checking applications tomorrow so I would expect we can start at the earliest wednesday or thursday. I will keep you posted on the progress.
